title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When working with binary projects, I am encountering an issue with scoped type hierarchy. I do not understand the problem.
OB: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, could you explain what this message means?
